attributes.action: Ban any sexual, violent or aggressive content including rape, pornography, animal abuse etc. on facebook
attributes.additional_details: There are too many images, videos and general comments posted on the Facebook network broadcasting sexual acts, cruelty to animals, and violent and aggressive behaviour. As many people are aware, young individuals use the site and they in particular should not be subjected to the gruesome and cruel content that is being allowed onto the facebook site today. Facebook should be a place where people can socialise in a safe environment.
